name: Rainy Days (introtogamesproduction)
description:
Overview

Rainy Days is a fascinating adventure that has you dodging and weaving through the rain. Can you make it through to to the other side of the storm?

In classing platforming fashion, Rainy Days allows you to run and jump in order to avoid dangerous spikes and saws. With simple controls that are easy to understand, Rainy Days can be played by all. Watch out though! Jump too quick or too slow and you'll be dead before you know...

Features
  • Supports High-Resolution Screens (Full HD, 4K, and even 5K!)
  • Infinite Number of Lives (No Game Over's here)
  • An Achievement Page (Can you get them all?)
  • Supports 5 Languages! (English, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, and Chinese)
  • Privacy Policy! (Gotta stay safe)
Controls

A/Left Arrow - Move Left

D/Right Arrow - Move Right

Space - Jump

Escape - Quit Level
